name: YarMobile
tagline: We will understand your business and its needs!
description:
For over 10 years we have been developing professional, custom-made mobile and web applications for companies that have specific needs & requirements.
WE CREATE CUSTOM MOBILE & WEB SOLUTIONS FOR:
FIELD SERVICE MANAGEMENT
SERVICE TECHNICIANS and EQUIPMENT MAINTENANCE
SALES REPRESENTATIVES
TRANSPORT
FREIGHT FORWARDING
WAREHOUSING
PRODUCTION MAINTENANCE AND OHS AUDITS
We analyze your company needs thoroughly and create a custom made application for you even in 4-8 weeks. Let us estimate your project. Contact us now and get an offer in 48 hours
We offer the creation of custom-made complex mobile solutions (web + mobile) for businesses. We direct our services to small, medium and large companies that require an application made according to their needs. Our apps exceed their requirements.
What makes us different is our experience and approach to your needs. Thanks to it when working with us you get added value in the form of best-verified practices, processes, and solutions.
Our workflow:
free advice, analysis of requirements
complete design of your application discussed with you on a regular basis, or usage of your specification document
information about work progress on a regular basis, app development and testing
transfer of copyrights and source codes to you
installation of app's server part on your server
12+ months warranty, free support
further app development
perfect contact from start to the end of the project
PROJECT ESTIMATION 24/7Â
